trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The blazebear has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mist Sight
entries: The blazebear can see normally through heavily obscured areas created by mist or fog, including areas created by spells such as Fog Cloud.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blazebear makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one attack with Stunning Gaze if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage.

action.name: Stunning Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: The blazebear targets two creatures it can see within 120 feet of itself. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or have the {@condition stunned} condition until the start of the blazebear's next turn.

reaction.name: Antimagic Swipe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature casting a spell of 3rd level or lower. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or the spell fails and has no effect.
